recipe_name: Tomato, apple and soft duck egg salad
author: Phil Vickery
method: Mix the tomato, spring onion, apple, balsamic vinegar, and olive oil together in a large bowl and season to taste with salt and freshly ground black pepper. Spoon into a serving bowl and top with the poached duck egg.
ingredients: 1 tomato, sliced,  1 spring onion, sliced,  1 apple, sliced,  1 tbsp balsamic vinegar,  3 tbsp olive oil,  salt and freshly ground black pepper ,  large handful fresh coriander,  1 duck egg, poached, to serve
